subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pitted against three Cy Young Award winners in three days, the Yankees got off to a good start by topping Max Scherzer. Pitcher David Phelps, though, was placed on the 15-day disabled list.
snippet: Pitted against three Cy Young Award winners in three days, the Yankees got off to a good start by topping Max Scherzer. Pitcher David Phelps, though, was placed on the 15-day disabled list.
